statements: DELETE FROM royalty_info WHERE artist_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND producer_id = '234e5678-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
DELETE FROM royalty_info WHERE producer_name LIKE 'John%' AND royalty_amount > 1000.00;
DELETE FROM producers WHERE producer_name = 'ABC Productions';
DELETE FROM producers WHERE producer_name = 'John Doe' AND production_company = 'XYZ Productions'
DELETE FROM artists WHERE artist_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM producer WHERE producer_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM producer WHERE production_company = 'ABC Music';
